roleset.name: build
roleset.note: ARRANGE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'assemble' and 'put'. Member of VNcls build-26.1, put-9.1, establish-55.5-1. (from arrange.01-v)
ARRANGEMENT-N NOTES: Based on verb entry arrange.01; corresponds to Verbnet entries build-26.1, put-9.1, establish-55.5-1. (from arrangement.01-n)

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: Mr. Panet-Raymond said he doesn't think [Messrs. Drabinsky and Gottlieb]-1 are ``anywhere close'' to *trace*-1 arranging financing. offer before the stock begins to rise again .

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: Security Pacific, meanwhile, said [it]-2 expects *trace*-2 to arrange $430 million in bank loans for Vitro.

example.name: with other args
example.text: John arranged his clean laundry from a neat stack into an untidy pile.

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: Her arrangement of repeated parts into patterns creates symmetries and contrasts that are alluring and elegant.

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: And one White House official reported that Mr. Agnos had been `` very helpful '' in *PRO* making arrangements for Mr. Bush 's hastily scheduled trip to California .
example.arg: for Mr. Bush's hastily scheduled trip to California.
